paragraph.paragraph: The Interface layer gathers a set of classes covering all the capabilities an application need to interface efficiently with a DBMS.
The interface affords these main capabilities:

list.item: 40_selection_access/index.xml Accessing data selected from the database.
50_data_object_coupling/index.xml Coupling database objects with Eiffel objects.
60_query_variables/index.xml Binding variables in a database query.

Dealing with database
80_database_control/index.xml status and behavior .

paragraph.note: Note: In general, each of these capabilities corresponds to one EiffelStore class.
